title: Advanced CRC-8 Calculator
name: LGF_CalcCRC8Advanced
description: The function uses 8 bits as the generator polynomial (mask) and additional parameters for CRC calculation.

input.name: reflectInput
input.description: Mirror the bits within the input byte

input.name: reflectResult
input.description: Mirror the order of the bits within the result

input.name: noOfElements
input.description: Number of elements to be used in CRC calculation

in/out.name: array
in/out.description: Data stream for which the CRC value will be calculated
